name: Audino
description: It touches others with the feelers on its ears, using the sound of their heartbeats to tell how they are feeling.

abilities.name: Healer
abilities.effect: Friendly Pokémon next to this Pokémon in double and triple battles each have a 30% chance of being cured of any major status ailment after each turn.
abilities.description: May heal an ally’s status conditions.
